page.title: 01GENERAL OVERVIEW OF THE AREA
page.content: Consisting of some 3/5 residential property, the rest rural, this block covers the N.W. sector of Hereford, a {Cathedral}city &{County Town}on the {River Wye,}set in gently undulating {landscape}of medium sized mixed farms & villages. In this block, the city's livestock & open{markets}serve the county's farming community. Three large factories -{Wiggins}metal alloys,{Bulmers}Cider &{Sun Valley } Poultry - as well as numerous smaller concerns on 3 industrial estates, provide employment for many residents of the Victorian houses & estates now encroaching on surrounding farmland. Close to the city centre is the{race- {course}& new Sports complex opening July 1985. Also of note - 5 hospitals, 7 schools, colleges for Central Hfds., a{National Blind College,}& a{Farriery {School,}one of only 2 in the country.
